desc: I need the next "Harmon Brothers". You may not have heard of them but you have most definitely seen their work. They are the genius behind Poo Pourri, Squatty Potty, and Purple. Their social media videos often garner upwards of 150M+ views, and have put new brands on the industry map in days. I have a new oral health company and awareness is everythingVideo consumption is growing by 100% every year,  64% of customers are more likely to buy a product online after watching a video about it.It’s become every entrepreneur’s dream to create that one video that drives awareness, conversions and growth. THATS WHERE YOU COME INHarmon is widely known for taking uncomfortable/boring(brushing and looking after your teeth!!!) topics and making them comfortable by adding a dose of humour. This gives it shareabilityThere are key parts of the video itself that merit testing. The intro is one to focus on. Different intro’s to test through each with potential customers. The ‘call to action’ and the ‘offer being made’ are two other sections to focus on.While companies like Dollar Shave have launched extremely successful one-off campaigns, they have tried to follow up with various other videos that haven't achieved the same level of virality or ROI.Nail it then scale itIf you think you can take these guys on please contact me.A 3min to [url removed, login to view] advert aimed at mums to promote my oral health products, offer tips but it has to be real and funny. Check out the Chatbook adverts (also written and produced by Harmon) Probably my favourite[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]Thank you
title: Series of humorous video adverts

desc: What is WrenchCoach?It is an exam prep solution for those who want to be certified as an auto mechanic by the ASE. The ASE is the official organization that controls and create standards in the auto technician industry.Think about breaks, you want your auto technician to be knowledgeable! You don’t want to run in an accident because your breaks were incorrectly repaired. The ASE certification exams provide that seal of approval.There are over 40 certification exams, divided into 16 smaller series. For example:A series: automobile (not trucks, or buses)B series: busesEtc..See the ASE website ([url removed, login to view]) to find out more.Tasks descriptionSocial media content creation and schedulingCreate images (on Canva)Monday motivation, Tuesday tips, Wednesday review, Thursday FREE, Friday Fun, Saturday definition, Sunday StrategySchedule social media contentSchedule according to the plan or excel sheet or verbal instructionsPost in other mediumQuoraLinkedInEtc. per instructionInstagramComment on followers’ postsDaily (e.g., love this group of #SoontobeAM! If you need a program to study, look up [url removed, login to view])Like as many pictures and comments as possibleRespond to commentsRepostIf a post is relevant and worth reposting, ask the user’s permission.Repost with the original follower’s credit and add text.FacebookShare any interesting post related to the areaExample: If a funny video is being popular and is related to our areaExample: If an article about education is relevant to our areaCan be: image, video, someone else’s article, something very funny (even if it is NOT completely related), motivational etc.Like everyone who comments on a post we madeBlogsCreate a blog postTopic and instructions will be givenAt least 1000 wordsFind own images/GIFUse headingsUse keywords provided at 1% densityInsert sign up formResearch sources of information to create good contentFormat blog postI will write the document but you will make changes and style it.Look for errors (grammar, punctuation etc).Find 2-3 sentences that are worth being in “quotation” marks to grab user’s attention – in Heading 3, orangePut subheading in heading 2 (color of the business, blue or green)Make sure there is enough white space between paragraphsHyperlink a few areas with keywords to reference back to the site and help SEOAdd the code for the corresponding form go be embedded (lead magnet, get reader’s email). For example, if the post is about “how to practice for the case studies” I will create a document that will have 10 free practice questions. This will be turned into a subscription form.Add Claire’s bioAdd giphy or images that are appropriate for the context – put the embed code in redAdd a lead magnet somewhere on the blogGet code from ConvertKit for specific formIf form does NOT exist, create one. This may involve creating a FREE document that I will write, but you will style.AdsSchedule with FB ads or AdespressoRecreate an image in the size desiredSquare for carousel type (multiple images)Facebook Ad size for ad featuring only 1 images -> generally we do thisAdd heading, ad text, link, and link text (we will usually have 2 versions, so we test for them for 1-2 days and keep only the one with the higher CTR)Select the $$ amountSelect audiencePublishRecord the resultsInput data in our spreadsheet. This is used for future ads.ImagesFor social media or blog postingWhen new images are put into the “idea” folder:Modify, trim, reproduce image to make reuseFind another image that can be replacing the imageFInd fFind Full description of work: [url removed, login to view]2 versions:
title: Hire a Virtual Assistant (Wide range of skills required)

desc: THIS IS A PRE-CONTRACT QUOTE. WE DO NOT HAVE A SIGNED CONTRACT.We are quoting for 1080p, steady-cam video and aerial drone photography for a project in Pasco County, Florida. Work entails video of 2.8 miles of pre-construction roadway to include physical features and existing structures (only one side of the street). In addition, on three occasions, shoot aerial still images of the roadway at 300' intervals for the full 2.8 miles. Include metadata with images.The work is NOT creative photography. Rather, it is to document before, during and after work of the construction. The best candidate will, 1) Have five years of professional photography experience, 2) Have experience being on construction sites, 3) Be incorporated such as S-corp or LLC, 4) Carry or acquire $1 million in General Liability insurance,  5) Commit to about 4 month project beginning in December 2017, 6) Have, or acquire a license to fly a drone, 7) Have at least 12mp camera on drone, 8) Live near the area.If you have an interest, please let me know.Joel
title: Video and Aerial Photography of Road Construction, Pasco County Florida
